verbs.description: [ARG1: President Trump] [V: becomes] [ARG2: the first U.S. president to meet with a North Korean leader when he sits with Kim Jong Un in Singapore] .
President Trump becomes [ARG0: the first U.S. president] to [V: meet] [ARG1: with a North Korean leader] [ARGM-TMP: when he sits with Kim Jong Un in] Singapore .
President Trump becomes the first U.S. president to meet with a North Korean leader [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG1: he] [V: sits] [ARG2: with Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] .
